name: Untitled Island Game
description:
Explore the little island, walk around, find something, or just simply sit down and watch the sunset. The webGL version is not good in visual quality, and may contain bugs in some browsers, so please also download the stand alone versions for best experience.

Using

"TABS Peasant" (https://skfb.ly/WZyR ) by TheTobster15 is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ ).

"TABS CMM" (https://skfb.ly/WZXG ) by TheTobster15 is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ ).

Using Assets from Unity Store:

“Unity3D True FPS/Full Body Awareness Controller” (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HIBRqPMj1m0 ) by SlapChickenGames

“Unreleased Game Music Pack” ( https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/unreleased-game-music-pack-62626#description ) by Cafofo (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/16881)

“Calm Melancholic“ https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/calm-melancholic-orchestral-purple-horizon-183167 by Dimitri Kovalchuk(https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/40368)

“Simple Low Poly Nature Pack” (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/simple-low-poly-nature-pack-157552 ) by NeutronCat(https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/8625)

“Customizable skybox” (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/customizable-skybox-174576) by Key Mouse (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/48725 )

“Low Poly Survival modular Kit” (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-survival-modular-kit-vr-and-mobile-128903 ) by Albert_Einsteinn (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/37980 )

“Low Poly Free Vegetation Kit” (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/low-poly-free-vegetation-kit-176906 ) by Proxy Games (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/44981 )

“Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack” (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple-nature-pack-162153 ) by JustCreate (https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/44390) “Free Low Poly Nature Forest” (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/free-low-poly-nature-forest-205742 ) by Pure Poly(https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/49700)
